persName.roleName: Prince of Great Britain and Ireland

note.p: Birth: Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England (13 January 1883)
Career|: Only son of the Duke of Connaught and Strathearn, KG, FRS
Major General, Governor, union of South Africa (1920-1924)
Freemason, initiated, 25 may 1911, Royal Alpha Lodge No 16, London
Honours: GCVO 1899; KG 1902; KT 1913; CB 1915; GCMG 1918
References: Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' London, 2010, page 23
